mapper.insert: MERGE INTO USER2.AIR_INFO A USING DUAL ON (A.TMFC = #{tmFc}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ICAO_CODE = #{icaoCode}, A.AIRPORT_NAME = #{airportName}, A.WD = #{wd}, A.WS = #{ws}, A.TA = #{ta}, A.QNH = #{qnh} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.ICAO_CODE, A.AIRPORT_NAME, A.TMFC, A.WD, A.WS, A.TA, A.QNH ) VALUES ( #{icaoCode}, #{airportName}, #{tmFc}, #{wd}, #{ws}, #{ta}, #{qnh} )

MERGE INTO USER2.USER_INFO A USING DUAL ON (A.EMAIL = #{email}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, A.DEPARTURE_DATE = #{departureDate} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.SEQ, A.EMAIL, A.DEPARTURE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{email}, #{departureDate}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM USER2.USER_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER2.TAF_INFO( LINE0, LINE1, LINE2, LINE3, LINE4, CREATION_DATE ) VALUES ( #{resMap0}, #{resMap1}, #{resMap2}, #{resMap3}, #{resMap4}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM USER2.TAF_INFO ORDER BY CREATION_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
